title: Ikujinashi no Kimi ni Sasageru
original_name: いくじなしの君に捧げる
sinopse: Hinata Harui and Seiji Hatsuyama are childhood friends. Hinata loves his innocent friend's affective mode. But, one day, due to his carelessness, he is attacked in the park by an unknown pervert...and this event brought a change to their relationship.
